name: City Blocks (itch)
description:
Instructions: Balance controlling the right-side paddle, while typing words for effects and multipliers. Control paddle using arrow keys or bracket keys. Type words with the keyboard. Press escape to pause game.

Do you find yourself with too much time? Need to relax? Can't get rid of that gnawing feeling that something is wrong? Play City Blocks! City Blocks is a fun twist on a timeless classic. In City Blocks you must steer the ball in to the bricks without letting the words stop you.
